name: saja boys amigurumi dolls
notes:
crochet all five members of the saja boys in adorable chibi amigurumi form! this pattern includes detailed instructions to create each memberâ€™s unique hairstyle and outfit, perfect for k-pop fans and amigurumi lovers alike.

* this pattern is written using us
  crochet terms.
* i used the underside of the amigurumi
  hairpiece as the visible side,
  allowing the strands to naturally curl
  towards the face.
* use the [yarn under single crochet][1]
  technique to achieve tighter, more
  aligned stitches.
* crochet in continuous spiral rounds.
  do not join at the end of each round
  unless otherwise stated.
* use a [running stitch marker][2] to keep
  your place when crocheting in rounds.
* use the [ultimate finish][3] to neatly
  close up your amigurumi pieces.
* **optional**: use the [invisible increase][4]
  and [invisible decrease][5] to enhance the
  appearance of your amigurumi.


  [1]: https://www.onceuponacheerio.com/2022/05/how-to-yarn-under-single-crochet.html
  [2]: https://www.onceuponacheerio.com/2023/04/how-to-use-running-stitch-marker.html
  [3]: https://www.onceuponacheerio.com/2023/04/close-amigurumi-ultimate-finish.html
  [4]: https://www.onceuponacheerio.com/2023/03/how-to-invisible-increase-in-crochet.html
  [5]: https://www.onceuponacheerio.com/2023/04/how-to-single-crochet-decrease.html
